perturbation.original_text: WHEREAS Diversinet is a provider of mobile device security and authentication solutions for the mobile data ecosystem, and is the owner of  certain software products, user documentation and services and the related trade-marks;    AND WHEREAS Reseller has represented that it is qualified and desires to act as a reseller of certain of Diversinet's products within a certain  defined territory, and agrees to use its best efforts to market and sell such products in such territory;
perturbation.changed_text: WHEREAS Diversinet is a provider of mobile device security and authentication solutions for the mobile data ecosystem, and is the owner of  certain software products, user documentation and services and the related trade-marks;    AND WHEREAS Distributor has represented that it is qualified and desires to act as a reseller of certain of Diversinet's products within a certain  defined territory, and agrees to use its best efforts to market and sell such products in such territory;
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'Reseller' with 'Distributor' in the second 'WHEREAS' clause. This introduces ambiguity as to whether 'Reseller' and 'Distributor' refer to the same entity, potentially impacting obligations and rights throughout the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: Reseller's customers (the "Customers") are defined as those organizations/enterprises that will market and manage the end-users of the  Products (the "End-Users"). Reseller acknowledges and agrees that it does not have the right to assign sub-resellers under this Agreement  outside of the Territory, except with the prior written consent of Diversinet.
perturbation.changed_text: Reseller's clients (the "Customers") are defined as those organizations/enterprises that will market and manage the end-users of the  Products (the "End-Users"). Reseller acknowledges and agrees that it does not have the right to assign sub-resellers under this Agreement  outside of the Territory, except with the prior written consent of Diversinet.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'customers' with 'clients'. Although the term 'Customers' is defined, using 'clients' interchangeably introduces ambiguity. It's now uncertain if 'clients' is a subset of 'Customers,' or a completely different entity, affecting rights, responsibilities, and scope of the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: Reseller agrees to maintain complete books, records and accounts relevant to the computation of and accounting for the amounts payable under  this Agreement. Reseller agrees to allow Diversinet or its agents and representatives the right to examine and audit such books, records and  accounts during Reseller's normal business hours for no more than once per calendar quarter upon reasonable notice.
perturbation.changed_text: Reseller agrees to maintain complete books, records and financial statements relevant to the computation of and accounting for the amounts payable under  this Agreement. Reseller agrees to allow Diversinet or its agents and representatives the right to examine and audit such books, records and  accounts during Reseller's normal business hours for no more than once per calendar quarter upon reasonable notice.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced 'accounts' with 'financial statements.' Although the text references 'accounts', the new text replaces the definition of those with 'financial statements.' It's now uncertain which records Diversinet is allowed to examine, affecting rights, responsibilities, and scope of the audit agreement.
